content.html: One of the reasons that PayPal was successful is that when Elon started his not shipping stuff, blaming and disparaging his best engineers, and demanding untimely and unnecessary "whole system rewrites," Peter Thiel fired him immediately. I'm not a Thiel fan... but I understand.
content.value:
One of the reasons that PayPal was successful is that when Elon started his not shipping stuff, blaming and disparaging his best engineers, and demanding untimely and unnecessary "whole system rewrites," Peter Thiel fired him immediately.

I'm not a Thiel fan... but I understand.
